article_title: Mobile IT Helps Power Oil & Gas Industry
article_text: Marketing, which is highly quantitative, targeted, and tied to business outcomes, will likely become highly automated by 2025, says Tom Davenport, a senior advisor with Deloitte Analytics. The few people who will comprise the marketing team of the future will be responsible for ensuring that promotions are creative and for overseeing the automated systems.

twitter.description: Mobile technologies have become a power tool for the oil and gas sector, enabling people to collaborate more effectively across far-flung geographies and time zones, writes Guest Columnist Emile Trombetti.
